data.title: Descendants of King James I & VI
data.text:
4.2.2.3.4.1.Emperor Joseph II Benedikt August Johann Anton Michael Adam, b.Schönbrunn 13 Mar 1741, d.Vienna 20 Feb 1790; m.1st Vienna 6 Oct 1760 Pss Isabella Maria of Bourbon-Parma (Madrid 31 Dec 1741-Vienna 27 Nov 1763***); m.2d Schönbrunn 23 Jan 1765 Pss Marie Josepha of Bavaria (Munich 30 Mar 1739-Vienna 28 May 1767***)

4.2.2.3.4.1.1.Maria Theresia Elisabeth Philippine Louise Josepha Johanna Archdss of Austria, b.Vienna 20 Mar 1762, d.there 23 Jan 1770

4.2.2.3.4.2.Karl Joseph Emanuel Johann Nepomuk Anton Prokop Archduke of Austria, b.Vienna 1 Feb 1745, d.there 18 Jan 1761

4.2.2.3.4.3.Emperor Leopold II Joseph (Schönbrunn 5 May 1747-Vienna 1 Mar 1792); m.Innsbruck 5 Aug 1765 Infanta Maria Luisa of Spain (Naples 24 Nov 1745-Vienna 15 May 1792***)

4.2.2.3.4.3.1.Emperor Franz II Joseph Karl (Florence 12 Feb 1768-Vienna 2 Mar 1835); the last Holy Roman Emperor, in 1806 he became Emperor Franz of Austria; m.1st Vienna 6 Jan 1788 Dss Elisabeth of Württemberg (b.Treptow 21 Apr 1767, d.Vienna 18 Feb 1790***); m.2d by proxy at Naples 15 Aug 1790, in person at Vienna 19 Sep 1790 Pss Maria Theresa of Bourbon-Two Sicilies (b.Naples 6 Jun 1772, d.Vienna 13 Apr 1807***); m.3d Vienna 6 Jan 1808 Archduchess Maria Ludovika of Austria-Este ***; m.4th Vienna 10 Nov 1816 Pss Karoline Auguste of Bavaria (b.Mannheim 8 Feb 1792, d.Vienna 9 Feb 1873)

4.2.2.3.4.3.1.1.Ferdinand Karl Leopold Joseph Franz Margelin, Emperor of Austria, b.Vienna 19 Apr 1793, d.Prague 29 Jun 1875); abdicated 1848; m.Vienna 27 Feb 1831 Pss Maria Anna of Savoy (b.Rome 1803, d.Prague 1884***)

4.2.2.3.4.3.1.2.Joseph Franz Leopold Archdk of Austria, b.Vienna 9 Apr 1799, d.there 30 Jun 1807

4.2.2.3.4.3.1.3.Franz Karl Joseph Archdk of Austria, b.Vienna 7 Dec 1802, d.there 8 Mar 1878;

m.Vienna 4 Nov 1824 Pss Sophie of Bavaria (Munich 27 Jan 1805-Vienna 28 May 1872)

4.2.2.3.4.3.1.3.1.1.Rudolf Franz Karl Joseph, Crown Pr of Austria, b.Laxenburg 21 Aug 1858, d.Mayerling 30 Jan 1889; m.Vienna 10 May 1881 Pss Stephanie of Belgium (b.Laeken 1864, d.Pannonhalma, Hungary 1945***); Rudolf is said to have been father of an illegitimate son named Carl Rudolf Salvator N, who later took the name Robert Pachmann and had issue (see CEDRE, Austria, Vol III, p.31.)

4.2.2.3.4.3.1.3.3.2.Archdk Otto Franz Josef of Austria (Graz 21 Apr 1865-Vienna 1 Nov 1906); m.Dresden 2 Oct 1886 Pss Maria Josepha of Saxony (Dresden 31 May 1867-Schloß Wildenwart 28 May 1944***); Archduke Otto had two illegitimate children by Louise Robinson, an actress who married a Baron Poglodowski (she died destitute in a Vienna hospital, probably on 11‑12‑1934.) "No secret was made about the liasion and she frequently lived in his palace ... there were two children by the union." according to the NYTimes article, the son became an electrician and the daughter a governess in Wiesbaden. "Some years ago both emigrated to America."
